titleStmt.title: An answer to the most materiall parts of Dr. Hamond's booke of schisme: or a defence of the Church of England, against exceptions of the Romanists written in a letter from a Catholique gent. to his friend in England.
titleStmt.author: B. P.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: B.P. Brussels the 30 March, 1654.
A reply to: Hammond, Henry. Of schisme a defence of the Church of England against the exceptions of the Romanists.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
